metadata.title: USN-4358-1 -- libexif vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libexif incorrectly handled certain tags. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2018-20030)  It was discovered that libexif incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash. (CVE-2020-12767)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4358-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libexif-doc - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.1 libexif-dev - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.1 libexif12 - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
